course_title: Special Topics in Contemporary Journalism - DECDE SOC MEDIA

sections.comments: There is an undergraduate cross-listed course for 4th year BA students.   Please search for JRNL 420 for course registration details for this undergraduate section. If the course becomes full, please email jrnl.journal@ubc.ca to be added to the Waitlist.This course will take place online.  Course access will be emailed to students prior to start of the first class.
